localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Bored of long news articles? Nyus is a news app designed for teenagers. It gives news in the form of memes and makes news fun and engaging. We aggregate our news from the top news sources in India and are rated 4.6 stars on Play Store.
blogPost.body: Bored of long news articles? Nyus is a news app designed for teenagers. It gives news in the form of memes and makes news fun and engaging. We aggregate our news from the top news sources in India and are rated 4.6 stars on Play Store.
blogPost.title: Nyus - Get news in the form of memes
blogPost.author: Puru Thakkar

localize.description: 厌倦了冗长的新闻文章？Nyus是一款专为青少年设计的新闻应用。它以备忘录的形式给出新闻，让新闻变得有趣和吸引人。我们从印度的顶级新闻来源汇总我们的新闻，并在Play Store上被评为4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以备忘录的形式获取新闻

localize.description: 厭倦了冗長的新聞文章？Nyus是一款專爲青少年設計的新聞應用。它以備忘錄的形式給出新聞，讓新聞變得有趣和吸引人。我們從印度的頂級新聞來源彙總我們的新聞，並在Play Store上被評爲4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以備忘錄的形式獲取新聞

previous.excerpt: The Stand & Spin Mat - this new, revolutionary mat allows you to smoothly pivot, swivel, and turn 360° while standing. Made of premium materials and podiatrist approved for active stretching and massaging. Never be bored again at your standing desk!
previous.title: Fidgity Stand & Spin Mat - Never be bored again at your standing desk

localize.description: 站立与旋转垫--这款全新的、革命性的垫子可以让您在站立时平稳地旋转、旋转和360°旋转。由优质材料和足科医生认可的主动拉伸和按摩。再也不用无聊地站在办公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式办公桌不再无聊

localize.description: 站立與旋轉墊--這款全新的、革命性的墊子可以讓您在站立時平穩地旋轉、旋轉和360°旋轉。由優質材料和足科醫生認可的主動拉伸和按摩。再也不用無聊地站在辦公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式辦公桌不再無聊

next.title: Dave Ramsey is against stimulus checks because ‘if $600 or $1,400 changes your life, you were pretty much screwed already’ https://t.co/x0L4bon8Sh

localize.full_text: 戴夫-拉姆齐反对经济刺激支票，因为 "如果600美元或1400美元改变了你的生活，你就已经差不多完蛋了 "https://t.co/x0L4bon8Sh。
戴夫-拉姆齊反對經濟刺激支票，因爲 "如果600美元或1400美元改變了你的生活，你就已經差不多完蛋了 "https://t.co/x0L4bon8Sh。
